name: Shining Force: Cross Raid
overview:
Shining Force Cross Raid (シャイニング・フォース クロスレイド) is an update to Shining Force Cross. It was not ported to any home systems.


CPU : Intel Pentium E2160 CPU @ 1.8 GHz
Graphics : A “nVidia GPU” 384MB of GDDR3 RAM and supports Shader Model 4.0 and 2x 1920×1200 displays.
Audio : 5.1 ch HD Audio
Memory : 1GB de DDR2 PC2-6400 RAM
Network : Onboard Gigabit LAN, Compatible ALL.Net
Storage : 32GB SSD drive for storage
Operating System : Microsoft Windows Embedded Standard 2009
